testsuite.name: com.propertyconnection.LandlordIntegrationSpec

testcase.name: Saving a landlord to the database
Updating a landlord and changing its properties
Deleting a landlord and making sure it's gone from the db
Saving a landlord with invalid properties causes an error

testsuite.system-out: --Output from Saving a landlord to the database-- --Output from Updating a landlord and changing its properties-- --Output from Deleting a landlord and making sure it's gone from the db-- --Output from Saving a landlord with invalid properties causes an error-- --Output from Recover from a failed validation--
testsuite.system-err: --Output from Saving a landlord to the database-- --Output from Updating a landlord and changing its properties-- --Output from Deleting a landlord and making sure it's gone from the db-- --Output from Saving a landlord with invalid properties causes an error-- --Output from Recover from a failed validation--
